H0.text: Name the market-leading discount buying website with a portmanteau name, which rejected a $6bn takeover bid from Google. LivingSocial

H1.text: Name the market-leading discount buying website with a portmanteau name, which rejected a $6bn takeover bid from Google. Scoutmob

H2.text: Name the market-leading discount buying website with a portmanteau name, which rejected a $6bn takeover bid from Google. Google Offers

H3.text: Name the market-leading discount buying website with a portmanteau name, which rejected a $6bn takeover bid from Google. Groupon

A4.text: Groupon's channels have included Groupon Goods, which focuses on discounted merchandise.

A5.text: Groupon's promotional text strategy in the early years for the deals has been seen as a contributing factor to the popularity of the site.
